column4: When I create a VPN connection, I have to allow it to send all traffic over the tunnel, if I select "Use this connection only for resources on its network" then I can't access any of the servers on the VPN network
The only difference between the routes is the destination / gateway with 0.0.0.0 is going to ppp0 instead of wlan0
but the higher orutes should pick up first shouldn't they?
in cisco equipment the routing table priority is reversed, bottom = top prioritiy
